remarks: Every linear combination of a subset of a linear subspace is also contained in the linear subspace.  (Contributed by AV, 20-Apr-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
ellcoellss $p |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ S e. ( LSubSp ` M ) /\ V C_ S ) -> A. x e. ( M LinCo V ) x e. S ) $.
$d M x $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
